summary: Geir Manor is a small player home just to the east of Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
[b]IMPORTANT:[/b] You must have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340]General Stores[/url] installed in order for this mod to work.

A fairly simple player home with a great view of Lake Geir and the Throat of the World, located just east of Ivarstead. Plenty of storage space. Follower compatible.

This is the first mod I\'ve published, so I hope I\'ve covered all the bases. Constructive feedback is welcome!

[b]Changelog[/b]

0.2
Chest at foot of bed was not set to no respawn. This has been fixed and it is now safe for storing items.

0.1
Initial release.

[b]Credits[/b]

A big thanks to the following authors and their mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14135]BookSets Resource[/url] by Blary

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12394]Celtic Decor for Skyrim[/url] by DarkRider

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14133]FoodContainer Resource[/url] by Blary

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340]General Stores[/url] by Harvey2112

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17303]Rug Resource[/url] by yourenotsupposedtobeinhere
author: Jackrabb1t
